snippet.title: Is your App Slow? Make it Responsive by Tracking Download Progress (Ep 2 - Swift)
snippet.description:
A lot of apps become non responsive when you try to access large files from the internet.  Instead of hanging your app, you can use a progress bar to indicate internet activity inside your UI.  Today, we look at how to construct a custom URLSession that allows us to monitor download progress. Enjoy.

Episode 1: https://youtu.be/O3ltwjDJaMk
